mapper.select: select * from find_book_view where 1 = 1 AND USER_TYPE IS not NULL AND USER_TYPE != '' limit 6
select * from find_book_view ORDER BY BOOK_REGDATE DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT book.book_title , book_info.BOOK_INFO_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , BOOK_BORROW_CNT FROM book INNER JOIN book_info ON book.BOOK_CODE = book_info.BOOK_CODE ORDER by book_info.BOOK_BORROW_CNT DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT board.BOARD_NUM, attached_file.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM board INNER JOIN attached_file ON board.BOARD_NUM = attached_file.BOARD_NUM WHERE board_type = 24 AND attached_file.IS_MAIN = 'Y' limit 3
